name: Immunity of Sensibility
description:
A story-driven RPG featuring Maribel's emotional journey in the wonderfully perilous Gensokyo; with glimpses of her uncertain reality in the Outside World. 

                                                 Download for the best experience.

* This project is incomplete and we plan to add much more content into it post-jam. We hope you enjoy the game~ 

Controls:
Z / Space / Enter = Selection
X / Esc = Open Menu
Arrow Keys / ↑ ↓ → ←  = Movement
Shift = Sprint/Dash

Installation Guide:
Extract the folder into your desired location, then open to play.

Credits:
